name: mediacms
description: MediaCMS is an open-source media sharing platform that enables users to upload, transcode, and stream videos and photos. It includes advanced admin controls, metadata, and API, ideal for content hosting.
features: Video transcoding: Automatically convert uploaded videos to multiple formats and resolutions for streaming.
Photo management: Upload and organize images with albums, tags, and metadata.
Streaming server: Deliver video content with adaptive bitrate streaming for optimal playback.
User management: Support multiple users with profiles, upload quotas, and permission levels.
Content moderation: Review and approve user uploads before publication with moderation queue.
Search functionality: Find media by title, description, tags, or uploader using full-text search.
Embed support: Generate embed codes to share videos on external websites and platforms.
Comment system: Enable discussions on media with threaded comments and moderation tools.
Analytics dashboard: Track views, engagement, and popular content with detailed statistics.
API access: Integrate with external applications using comprehensive REST API.
Subtitle support: Upload and display subtitles in multiple languages for video content.
Mobile responsive: Access and upload media from any device with adaptive interface.
